title: E-mail verification
body:
I opened my client, received a request for email verification.  Clicked on verify, opened my browser, and it was a pretty old email.  As I was changing it, it asked me for my password...

Mind you, I've already logged in to league at this point, and I've been logged into lolesports.com all day so far.  Do you really need me to put it in again or was this a new-ish scam?

replies.body: What's the link that it sent you over towards?  If the messaging was from the client then it should be legit.  Keep in mind that you might have to log back in if you were previously logged to a different section or region url.

https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect

It LOOKS legit but I've never gotten a link in client this way, so wanted to not take any chances.  I tried to change my email and it asks for password, but I'm already logged in.
Yeah, it's a good link!  The update looks to have the client give a notification to verify your email.
